benchmark_details.name: MCTB ENCH : M ULTIMODAL COGNITION TOWARDS TEXT-RICH VISUAL SCENES BENCHMARK
benchmark_details.overview: MCTBench is introduced to evaluate the cognitive capabilities of Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) through visual reasoning and content-creation tasks in text-rich visual scenes.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the cognitive capabilities of MLLMs in text-rich visual scenes.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset primarily focuses on English, limiting generalization to multilingual scenes.

data.source: Approximately 5.2k text-rich images collected from various public datasets and 8.5k rigorously annotated question-answer pairs.
data.annotation: Annotations were manually reviewed with guidelines and generated through GPT assistance.

methodology.calculation: Mean accuracy is calculated for perception and reasoning tasks. GSB metric based on a comparison between model outputs and provided references.
methodology.interpretation: Higher mean accuracy indicates better performance in understanding and reasoning tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: Various MLLMs, such as GPT-4V and Gemini-Pro, were assessed against MCTBench.
methodology.validation: Evaluations included automated checks as well as human validation processes.
